name: A Snowball's Chance in Hell (Oohoos, prakkus)
name_original: A Snowball's Chance in Hell (Oohoos, prakkus)
description:
Intro:

You find yourself trapped in a hellish dungeon — not a place where a snowball can thrive. The Snow Reaper has confronted you with a proposal. He says he will grant you special powers that may help you escape in return for you offering some of your life source. One thing is for sure: You need to get out of here quickly! Will you take his offer or make your own way?

Instructions / How to play:

A side-scrolling platformer game where you play as a snowball fella. Avoid the obstacles and try to reach the Golden Peanut at the end!

Movement:

A - move left

D - move right

W - jump (hold to jump higher)

Powers (You can pay Death some health to switch powers):

1 - Super speed

2 - Super jumping

3 - Ice powers

Only one power can be active at a time.

With Ice powers active, you can place ice block platforms:

Q - place ice block to the left of you

E - place ice block to the right of you

S - place ice block below you

Only one ice block can be active at a time.

Credits:

Concept/Design - Davide Spiert and Logan Stolmaker

Art/Effects - Logan Stolmaker

Programming - Davide Spiert

Tools:
  • Unity
  • Blender
  • Krita

Thanks for playing!
